entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Morrisburg
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Sunny early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 70 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 4.
